section.title: Overview of the Open Archives Initiative Component (OAI)
section.para: the Open Archives Initiative Component (OAI) offers services in the following areas:

listitem.para: In order to enable a selective harvesting the meta data of Items and Containers of eSciDoc repository via OAI-PMH [http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html], Escidoc repository can be divided into sets composed of released and withdrawn Items and Containers. A set is not static: a set membership is defined by a CQL-query to the eSciDoc search service http://host:port/srw/search/escidocoaipmh_all. Therefore a set composition changes over time according to changes on Items and Containers and release of new Items and Containers.
A Set Definition represents a description of a set and contains its CQL-query. Escidoc OAI-Provider builds Escidoc sets for existing set definitions from results of their CQL-queries.
There are services, which support creation, updating and retrieval of Set Definitions.
